overview: Prior to Intent, Joel served as Head of Technology at Power of Entertainment; Vice President of Technology for iAmplify; Senior Manager at Qualcomm; and leader of technology teams for several Idealab portfolio companies, including EntertainNet, KidsOnline, Swap.com and Spun.com. Joel, also, Founded Dark Carnival Online in 1995, one of the Webâ€™s first media companies. Joel began his career by writing a software clone of the Macintosh for Quore Software Systems. He holds a B.S. from the Massachusetts Institute of Technology.
